channel.title: Way of spawning multiple items with one command
channel.description:
I need help for my Pi based server.
Me and my friend are just testing everything, with pking and skilling etc.
I'm not the best at coding, so I was wondering how to make one command to spawn multiple thing... Like 1) Statius Helm 2) Statius Body 3) Statius Platelegs 4) Dragon claws 5) Overload(4) 6) Astral, death, and earth runes. 7) Abyssal whip 8) Divine spirit shield 9) rest are rocktails.
If anybody could make one of these for me, and then explain to me how it's done, I would appreciate it VERY much...

item.title: Way of spawning multiple items with one command
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

This should work. Replace ‘ITEM ID’ with the ID. And ‘ITEM AMOUNT’ with the amount.

Not 100% sure, i haven’t used PI in months 

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pkitems")) {
                                try { 
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT);  
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); 
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); 
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); 
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); 
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); 
                                      c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT);               
                                     }
                        }

Read full topic
item.source: Way of spawning multiple items with one command
